name: Stwalcha
description:
A wacky game of hot potato.

2 to 4 players. Play with 4 gamepads or on a single keyboard.



This superior entity choses a champion


Everyone else JUST RUN ! If he doesn't pass on his curse the champion explodes after 10 seconds



The last man standing is rewarded with fireworks. And the game starts over, and over, and over...

Now some figures...

  • 9 characters with different abilities
  • 5 carefully crafted and beautiful maps
  • 2-4  players local multiplayer
  • 1-4 gamepads or a single keyboard
  • Infinite fun with infinite game :D
